title: LF D+ Top Laner and Jungler
body:
Hello,

HyperLight Esports is currently looking for a Diamond+ Top Laner and Jungle for our new team. If you are interested and fit the following criteria then please feel free to leave your summoner name at the bottom so that I can add you and we can chat.

Must be 17+
Must have teamspeak
Must be Diamond or higher so far this season and have 3 or more champions in your role
Be a non-toxic player
Be able to be on 3-4 nights per week to do training as well as be available for tournaments and what not
